title: Climate change limits forest recovery after wildfires

title_detail.value: Climate change limits forest recovery after wildfires

summary: New research suggests climate change makes it increasingly difficult for tree seedlings to regenerate following wildfires in low-elevation forests, which could contribute to abrupt forest loss.

summary_detail.value: New research suggests climate change makes it increasingly difficult for tree seedlings to regenerate following wildfires in low-elevation forests, which could contribute to abrupt forest loss.
